EmailTemplate.name: Corp Comm.BC - 7-10 v2
EmailTemplate.subject: Executive Roundtable Discussion - July 2014
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Team,
Prior to the July 4th holiday, Scott Yara, James Watters, Edward Hieatt and Hugh Williams recorded an Exec Roundtable discussion regarding the progress of the Go-to-Market/Business teams and the key takeaways as we head into the second half of 2014.
I think you will find their commentary and insights quite valuable, so please make the time to either watch the video <https://sites.google.com/a/gopivotal.com/inside-pivotal/employee-information/executive-roundtable> or listen to the audio podcast <https://sites.google.com/a/gopivotal.com/inside-pivotal/employee-information/executive-roundtable>. Thank you and here's to continuing on the path to a great 2014!
Best,
